special_attacks: curse of lycanthropy, death roll (1d8+4 plus trip), grab
melee: bite +7 (1d8+4 plus grab and curse of lycanthropy), tail slap +2 (1d12+2)
feats: Cleave, Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Power Attack, Run

sections.body: When grappling a foe of its size or smaller, a werecrocodile can perform a death roll upon making a successful grapple check. As it clings to its foe, the werecrocodile deals its bite damage, knocks the creature prone, and maintains the grapple.
sections.name: Death Roll

sections.body: Once per minute, a werecrocodile can increase its land speed to 60 feet for 1 round.
sections.name: Sprint

sections.body: Werecrocodiles merge the ruthless determination of a crocodile with the intelligence and adaptability of a humanoid. This fusion creates a maliciously cunning creature with no doubt of its own martial superiority.

special_qualities: armor training 1, change shape (human, hybrid, and crocodile; polymorph), hold breath, lycanthropic empathy (crocodiles and dire crocodiles), sprint
name: Werecrocodile (Hybrid Form)
